text: Bwoba oli wa kwewuunya, kyewuunyisa ekigambo kyabwe bwe bagamba nti: bwe tulimala okufuuka ettaka (nga tufudde) abaffe tuliddamu ne tutondebwa, abo nno beebo abaajeemera Mukama omulabirizi waabwe era abo enkoligo zigenda kubeera mu nsingo zaabwe era abo be bantu bo muliro bo baakutuula bugenderevu mu gwo
